1.title: Cashier
1.description: You work as a cashier in a small store. You earn between $1 and $100.

11.title: Waiter
11.description: You work as a waiter in a restaurant. You earn between $101 and $200.

21.title: Bartender
21.description: You work as a bartender in a bar. You earn between $201 and $300.

31.title: Chef
31.description: You work as a chef in a restaurant. You earn between $500 and $700.

41.title: Manager
41.description: You work as a manager in a store. You earn between $800 and $1000.

51.title: CEO
51.description: You work as a CEO in a company. You earn between $1000 and $2000.

61.title: President
61.description: You work as a president in a company. You earn between $2000 and $3000.

71.title: King
71.description: You work as a king in a kingdom. You earn between $3000 and $4000.

81.title: God
81.description: You work as a god in a universe. You earn between $4000 and $5000.

91.title: Creator
91.description: You work as a creator of the universe. You earn between $5000 and $6000.
